content: *add a classic touch to your nursery or child s room with this lace throw lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 90425ad skill level easy level 2 550-099 pound of love yarn antique white 1 ball crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm shell pattern 1-row repeat work in pattern for 54 row crochet border to finish 90425b dreamy lace baby throw version 2 1 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/dreamy-lace-baby-throw-90425b
